entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 6:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to ice pellets late in the morning then to rain showers late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
